REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2367 reute r f BC-ANALOG-DEVICES-<ADI> 10-19 0046

TEXT.TITLE: ANALOG DEVICES <ADI> MAY REPURCHASE SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Analog Devices Inc said it may repurchase up to one mln of its 46 mln common shares outstanding on the open market over the next several months for use in its employee stock purchase and stock option plans. Reuter
